chapter.title: Project Management (P/M) Module
chapter.para: In this chapter, we describe Project Management. The following topics will be covered:

section.title: Projects
section.para: Projects provide a mechanism for linking Orders which share a common thread. Through the use of Projects, you can create and then track the relationship between all related Sales Orders, Work Orders, and Purchase Orders generated to meet Sales Order demand. At the Project level, you also have the ability to enter descriptive information, as well as to-do items (i.e., Tasks) related to the Project.
